item.title: RIVN
item.description: score:291 Chances: Rivian stock has dropped around 50% to begin 2024, after surging to end 2023, and is now 80% below its IPO price of $78. Earlier this month, the electric-car maker Rivian announced its new SUV, the R2 â€” a $45,000 family hauler that will get more than 300 miles in range.
